amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to restrict access to the Screening Partnership Program of the Transportation Security Administration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to enforce section 44920 (F) of title 49, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A042) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A042) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
